subdisciplines.name: Time-Series Analysis
subdisciplines.description: The application of statistical methods to analyze time-based data.

subdisciplines.name: Panel Data Analysis
subdisciplines.description: The application of statistical methods to analyze data sets that include observations over multiple time periods and/or cross-sectional units.

subdisciplines.name: Limited Dependent Variable Analysis
subdisciplines.description: The application of statistical methods to analyze dependent variables that have limited range or are otherwise restricted in their distribution.
